mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_birth, member_phone, member_email) values(#{memberIdentification}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, date_format(#{memberBirth}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail})
mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification} and member_password = #{memberPassword}

select member_id, member_identification, member_password, member_like_count, member_nickname, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_birth, member_gender, member_status, profile_location, profile_job, profile_salary, profile_hobby, profile_mbti, profile_height, profile_child, profile_married, file_id, file_original_name, file_system_name, file_register_date from view_member_dto
order by member_like_count desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
